attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are many reasons why we might want Brown to resign, but rather than having lots of narrow petitions on this topic (most of which have been rejected), I wanted one for all of us.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "resign". 

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21213

Prime Minister's Office
